description:
Elsa Maria is a witch who battles Sayaka at the end of Episode 7. Her barrier is full of dark shadows with a white background. Her symbolism includes Christian crosses, and the terrain forms a large arm holding either a torch or a monstrance. Elsa Maria appears to be praying before this object when Sayaka engages her. She fights with fanged snake-like minions and tree branches that extend from her body.
The shadow witch with a self-righteous nature. She continually prays for all of creation. She drags all life equally into her shadow without breaking her posture. One hoping to defeat her must know the blackest anguish.
Source: Puella Magi Wiki
name: Elsa Maria
